front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Surge Voltage Protective Equipment on Ac Rotating Machinery 1000 Volts and Greater Corrigendum 1: Replace Table 2 and Annex A.1 and A.2

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Errors identified in IEEE Std.C62.21-2003 are addressed in this corrigendum.
